string-array.name: tutorialMessages
string-array.item: Welcome to Overwatch Recommend, an app for recommending a hero given your current situation.
Start by dragging heroes from the center to the ally and enemy team respectively. Or swiping a hero up or down for the each team respectively.
Then select your map first followed by the whether you\'re on attack/defend. If you\'re playing a control map then select the section rather than attack/defend
Finally hit choose and the app will reorder the heroes with top left being the highest rated.
Use the reset button at the top right to reset the order and the trash can to reset everything.
Try to use you\'re own judgement and look at all the highest rated. Good luck and have fun!
